ComicInfo.Title: Puzzle Peace; The Secret of Tet Ami; Survivors; Stones; The Sith in the Shadow; Children of the Force
ComicInfo.Summary:
Mace Windu tracks down a mass murderer.
Mace Windu tells a story of his younger days to a class of Padawans.
Mace Windu teaches a Padawan a valuable lesson.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-13 06:12:36. [CVDB97456] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 08:48:17. [Issue ID 214998]
